text: - At TUI, we are one

of the world's leading
travel organizations,
offering end-to-end services and products
for over 20 million customers a year.

The most interesting and
exciting part of my role

is building the data
analytics and AI strategy

for the company and making
sure that supports TUI
on its digital transformation journey.

At TUI, we see the
opportunity for Generative AI
to help right across the customer journey.
One particular real-life use case
that we are progressing at the moment
is to use Generative AI to enhance
our content creation process
and improve our ability to scale

and deliver better
automated quality content
that we will then display and message

to our customers on our
websites, to chatbots,
to many different interactions we have
right across the journey.

We wanted to use a product
that would easily integrate
into the rest of the TUI landscape.

AWS and Bedrock certainly
tick all the boxes for TUI.

Our goal was to be able
to build, test, deploy,
and measure as quickly as possible.
We established that the best solution

was to use two models
as part of the solution.

So we chosen Llama 2
to be able to generate
the content descriptions for the hotel.

And then we also are
using Claude 2 to help

with the formatting of the
output and the content.

We wanted to operate in an
environment that was secure,
we wanted to have insights
and monitoring around cost control
and governance and security,

we needed to be able to
train and educate our people,

and working with a partner
such as AWS helps us to upskill
and continue us on our journey.

So we've been able to
deliver high quality content
that meets all of the standards.
We can now generate automated content
that previously took eight hours,
we can deliver that in under 10 seconds.

There are new models and
capabilities that AWS
and Bedrock are releasing all the time.

We want to continue to
evolve our understanding,
our learnings, we want to move quickly,

we want to move fast, but
also, we want to partner

with AWS, not just for now,
but for the long term as well.
(gentle music)
